td.content: s:78 year old white female presents with 2 days history of Body Aches. o:Height 61 in, Weight 173 lbs, Temperature 97.8 F, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15 a:Fibromyalgia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed CYMBALTA - 30 mg daily, and ordered Comprehensive Metabolic Panel.

s:a 79 year old white F retired c/o 9 days h/o Body Aches. NKDA. o:Height 62 in, Weight 179 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Fibromyalgia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed duloxetine - 60 mg daily, and ordered Comprehensive Metabolic Panel.
